Posts.Content: memetriker wrote: I had lumpectomy surgery on the 22 of April, very little pain afterwards until after they changed out the balloon for radiation. Now I am in pain, taking pain pills way to often. Is it better to use ice or heat to help relieve it? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: pain after lumpectomy memetriker memetriker

Posts.Content: Apr 23, 2016 05:13PM memetriker wrote: I had a lumpectomy yesterday and haven't been in to much pain. But this afternoon, I noticed a hard lump the size of a golfball just above the incision. It is hard and hurts when touched but has no discoloration. I have called the Doctors office but being Saturday I'm still waiting on them to call me back. Should I be worried?
Posts.Title: Lumpectomy incision care questions Strawberry8 Lind_z
